body_html:
hi @fninsiima,

First, can you verify that /home/flavia/Documents/ndk/toolchains/arm-linux-androideabi-4.9/prebuilt/linux-x86_64/bin/arm-linux-androideabi-gcc exists on your system and is executable?

As a potential quick fix, I would suggest that you try downloading/extracting r11c from here: https://dl.google.com/android/repository/android-ndk-r11c-linux-x86_64.zip, as occasionally Bazel will exhibit incompatibilities with the latest NDK.

As a potential quick fix, I would suggest that you try downloading/extracting r11c from here: https://dl.google.com/android/repository/android-ndk-r11c-linux-x86_64.zip, as occasionally Bazel will exhibit incompatibilities with the latest NDK.
body:
hi @fninsiima,

First, can you verify that `/home/flavia/Documents/ndk/toolchains/arm-linux-androideabi-4.9/prebuilt/linux-x86_64/bin/arm-linux-androideabi-gcc` exists on your system and is executable?

As a potential quick fix, I would suggest that you try downloading/extracting r11c from here: https://dl.google.com/android/repository/android-ndk-r11c-linux-x86_64.zip, as occasionally Bazel will exhibit incompatibilities with the latest NDK.
